mapper.select:
select count(g.id) from goods g join (SELECT g.id,IFNULL(SUM(gs.residue_num),0) sum from goods g left join t_goods_store gs on g.id=gs.goods_id GROUP BY g.id) temp on g.id=temp.id
g.inventory !=0 and IFNULL(g.inventory,0)-temp.sum>0 and g.state='0'
and g.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')

select g.id,g.name,g.purchash_price purchashPrice,g.cover_url coverUrl,(IFNULL(g.inventory,0)-IFNULL(temp.sum,0)) goodsNum from goods g join (SELECT g.id,IFNULL(SUM(gs.residue_num),0) sum from goods g left join t_goods_store gs on g.id=gs.goods_id GROUP BY g.id) temp on g.id=temp.id
g.inventory !=0 and IFNULL(g.inventory,0)-temp.sum>0 and g.state='0'
and g.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
LIMIT #{start},#{size}

select count(id) from goods
IFNULL(shelves,0)-IFNULL(residue_num,0)>0 and state='0'
and name like concat('%',#{name},'%')

select id,name,cover_url coverUrl, (IFNULL(shelves,0)-IFNULL(residue_num,0)) goodsNum from goods
IFNULL(shelves,0)-IFNULL(residue_num,0)>0 and state='0'
and name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
select sum(sales_volume) from goods where state='0'
